DOC.brief_summary: Our goal investigate whether early follicular supplementation GnRH antagonist flexible GnRH antagonist protocol , potential improve IVF-ET clinical result
DOC.detailed_description: GnRH antagonist offer many advantage use IVF-ET treatment , however , suspect yield lower pregnancy rate compare long GnRH agonist protocol . Our goal investigate whether early follicular supplementation GnRH antagonist flexible GnRH antagonist protocol , potential improve IVF-ET clinical result . Consecutive patient prospectively enrol randomly assign study control group . Patients low ovarian reserve uterine distortion exclude study . Both group treat recombinant FSH flexible GnRH antagonist protocol . Women study group also treat additional GnRH antagonist 0.25 mg/day day 1 , 2 3 menstrual cycle .
DOC.criteria: infertility IVF candidate failure previous IVF attempt low ovarian reserve untreated distortion uterine cavity medical contraindication IVF treatment
